# maximumImageSize

**Instance Property**

The maximum size of an image, in bytes, allowed for a sent group message.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumImageSize: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>?
```

## Discussion

When this value isn’t set, the system uses the value of [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/Configuration/maximumMessageSize] instead.
title: maximumImageSize
